thread.title: Michael J. Fox & 'Back to the Future' Cast Reunites for Special Anniversary Screening in NYC!
thread.title_full: Michael J. Fox & 'Back to the Future' Cast Reunites for Special Anniversary Screening in NYC! - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Michael J. Fox & 'Back to the Future' Cast Reunites for Special Anniversary Screening in NYC!
text: Michael J. Fox makes his grand entrance at the special anniversary screening of his classic film Back To The Future held at AMC Loews Lincoln Square on Wednesday night (October 21) in New York City. The 54-year-old actor was joined on the carpet by his wife, Tracy Pollan, as well as his co-stars Lea Thompson, [...] Â»
